title: mySQL
text:
start up: mysql -uroot
DESCRIBE tablename; --> describes info in table without displaying info in table
SELECT * FROM tablename; --> shows all columns and rows in table

title: Heroku
text:
const port = process.env.PORT || 3001

heroku create

git add -A
git commit -m "Pushing to Heroku"
git push heroku main

heroku open

https://coding-boot-camp.github.io/full-stack/heroku/heroku-deployment-guide
